collectible.name: Chronos Book - Voxels Lore
collectible.description: Chronos was one of the islands conquered by the Air Faction, from the Scarcity gnomes, before any inhabitant existed there. During the Scarcity War, the leaders were called upon to create Chronos as a solution to the Scarcity's land shortage. The Leaders disagreed upon themselves, but many gnomes stayed in the island, building the guilds of the seasons. Since its foundation, after the old leaders left, Chronos has always been a harmonious island. All its seasons worked like a fantastic clock, until they started to use bad forms of energy and produced high levels of CO2. VIDDA helped them to fix their central clock and bring solar energy to Chronos, restoring their connection with nature without losing the social life they achieved. Read more about Chronos' Lore here: https://www.voxelslore.com/index.php?title=Chronos
collectible.author: 0xe330dc28b47d73884ad88837aecfee1f49ad7e7b
